title: Friends
description: This is a photo of my friends and I after KPMD's showcase last semester; October 2023.

title: My Favorite Pokemon
description: This is a photo of my favorite pokemon Snorlax. Snorlax is considered the heaviest known Pokemon weighing over 1,000 pounds. Snorlax is a normal type pokemon and is weak against fighting type Pokemon.

title: Valorant
description: This is a photo of a video game I have been playing recently: Valorant. Valorant is an online multiplayer computer game, created by Riot Games. It is a first person game consisting of two teams of 5 battling each other. One side is attacking while the other is defending. Each player uses an agent with it own unique abilities.

title: My Favorite Singer
description: This is a photo of my favorite singer: Lana Del Rey. Lana Del Rey is an American singer-songwriter born June 21st, 1985. She has currently released 9 studio albums and plans on releasing her 10th in September of this year (2024).

title: My Favorite Band
description: This is a photo of my favorite band: The Black Keys. The Black Keys are a duo rock band originated from Akron, Ohio. Their newest album, Ohio Players, will be released April 5th, 2024.

title: My Favorite Movie
description: This is a photo of my favorite movie: Coraline. Coraline is a stop-motion film released in 2009. It is a Horror/Fantasy movie and was known to be disturbing to younger audiences.
